title: Koukaku Kidoutai: Shin Gekijouban
alternative_title: Ghost in the Shell (2015), Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie, 攻殻機動隊 新劇場版
description: The official website for Ghost in the Shell: Arise announced that a new Ghost in the Shell film is in production and is slated to open in theaters in Japan in 2015.
